title: Warrior
description: The Ancients were as gods. They commanded technologies that defied comprehension. Their rule spanned across worlds. But their sins overtook them, and for their sins, worlds died.  Anna is a warrior, a member of the elite caste that rules over what's left, making her way across the face of the dead world that the Ancients left behind. Nothing stands in her way. Until she meets a nameless girl with no memory... who may hold secrets that were better lost with the Ancients.
author: Mark Kalina
